Reviews.Title: “Great, comfortable hotel with 5-star amenities”
Reviews.Author: Erika B Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel clean comfortable beautiful decor wonderful amenities definitely designed exceptionally appointed breakfasts lovely included staff nice slight draw location quiet plus close bastille metro near opera house bastille draws political activities tends bit littered trash graffiti etc sort reminded berkeley paris scale little rough edges female traveling feel bit safe didnt specific threatening situations staying quaint parisian street definitely recommend hotel nice

Reviews.Title: “Nice design hotel, average service”
Reviews.Author: IL0veNature
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel twice business bad close bastille restaurants choose comfortable duvets choice pillows bit reception ok overly friendly paris hotels decoration nice reception time sometimes painters photographers bar service downstairs adequate looking cosy bar atmosphere breakfast served basic service slow basically lady serve coffee buffet stocked task times days

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Kat S
Reviews.Content: stayed night booked advance fantastic breakfast 130 pounds value money staff speaking english friendly troubles leaving luggage hours check perfect valentines day

Reviews.Title: “Very good for the internet price paid”
Reviews.Author: J0hnGibbs
Reviews.Content: stayed le marceau bastille overnight 9th january business trip street 4th floor quiet bed comfortable nights sleep preparation day ahead internet price €160 including breakfast bookingcom represented value opinion offer criticism admittedly minor scrambled eggs bacon offer breakfast buffet looked tasted display

Reviews.Title: “A very comfortable hotel”
Reviews.Author: Sarah L
Reviews.Content: stayed midjanuary 2012 street sixth floor found quiet light windows bathroom bedroom reasonable size paris standards comfortable bed wellappointed clean found staff helpful indeed speaking english friendly courteous breakfast french standards cheese offered excellent recommend stay fairly convenient central paris bus routes frequent service minutes left bank example metro stops bastille gare de lyon minutes’ walk

Reviews.Title: “Clean, welcoming, efficient and well located”
Reviews.Author: Cath34980
Reviews.Content: received warm welcome attentive staff shown ipod dock didnt sorted immediately reception ground floor seductive lighting trickling water feature looked inviting

Reviews.Title: “Practically lived there for a year”
Reviews.Author: KatBudapest
Reviews.Content: le marceau mb affectionately home monday thursday friday basis staying allowed experience meet staff staff staff absolutely friendly speaks excellent english except lady chantelle nice pretty arranged favourite 407 408 toiletries luggage left weekend brought arrival basic stayed time ones magenta dark grey color scheme business traveler wish clean bathroom bathrobes huge towels bathroom spotless unfortunately granted paris duvet nice warm bed comfortable upgrade beige bamboo green pink color somewhat larger basic nice comfortable breakfast buffet breakfast die baguette croissant pain au chocolate name decent variety cheeses try goat cheese smoked salmon ham eggs sausages warm food posh youghurt flavours fruits oranges grapefruits fruit salad freshly pressed orange juice grapefruit coffe caffee richard excellent internet location wireless internet available free reception significantly street building drawback streetside truck laundry trucks usually late night laundry truck car maybe waiting usually horn express disapproval unwanted wait looking quiet stay opt courtyard beautiful sunrise paris rooftops lot chimneys fitness tried equipment 1 threadmill 1 step machine horribly outdated definitely worth bringing gym stuff colleagues mine avid runners nice runs nearby des arts promenade top

Reviews.Title: “Don't Stay Here”
Reviews.Author: M H
Reviews.Content: global traveler worst hotels stayed floors dirty cigarette burns carpet beds uncomfortable service speak fitness center complete misrepresentation hotel advertising fitness center fitness center consists 3 workout machines size closet basement building desks unable computer checkout days hotel refund money checked bad lovely boutique hotel

Reviews.Title: “Nice Enough Hotel”
Reviews.Author: markk612
Reviews.Content: pleasant hotel doubles art gallery modern decor lobby smell atmosphere little hear standard paris comfortable comfortable beds soft linens excellently cleaned location little main tourist attractions horribly de la bastille ten minute walk taxi queue metro stop connection lines neighborhood unsafe little dark night de la bastille lively hours restaurants staff helpful depends desk pleasant free internet excellent plus complaint breakfast free didnt hard run wasnt refilled learned checkout pay €24 cheap empty juices lack eggs jams unacceptable charge breakfast overflowing wellstocked

Reviews.Title: “GREAT CHOICE”
Reviews.Author: Evangelia77
Reviews.Content: booked hotel greek agent office price 112 euronight breakfast included paris standards hotel clean street rest enjoy stay ok breakfast nice options wouldnt pay wasnt included dont refill 830 wont staff nice spoke english kept luggage hours cause late flight tell prepaid location nice bastille caferestaurants shops etc 5 minutes walking distance metro station paris prefer stay closer money paid considering paris expensive hotels dirty fantastic choice recomend pay reasonable price

Reviews.Title: “Lap of Luxury..without a wake up call!”
Reviews.Author: RestonVaDentist
Reviews.Content: recently stayed hotel marceau bastille bastille paris bank beautiful boutique hotel near gare de lyon rue jules cesar loved hotel modern art wake call morning catch train 730 am fortunately son called mobile phone hotel calibre shouldnt mistake

Reviews.Title: “A great hotel to come home to”
Reviews.Author: BettyAn
Reviews.Content: stayed nights using love quiet comfortable hotel considering paris dont free wifi love able chill day relax hotel eating chocolates bed check emails facebook travel lot stayed hotels lot country id similar comfortable bed comfortable cozy modern thats clean toiletry emit fantastic fragrance hallway air smells wonderful step hotel service friendly personable price reasonable stayed purple urban fourth floor facing inner courtyard hotels upgraded nice basic decent reason 5 star balance location hotel 5 10 minutes walk bastille metro painful feet hurting walking day lot closest super market 10 minutes walk direction metro closer gare de lyon theres lot bakeries restaurants close bastille center action feels freezing cold december personally locations previous hotels vendome st germain little central prime location concern id highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Ugh....”
Reviews.Author: bertzi
Reviews.Content: dont people hotel service atrocious tiny breakfast average paris times amazing treated hotel leave paris bad feeling eg day concierge especially exhibitions strange 70 found magazine bought days refused basic requests spoke onsite manager front desk cant talk im home sleep strange air con bathroom serious safety hazard overall hotel worst hotel honeymoon additional warning dont replenish breakfast stay else europe booked weve stayed 2 star hotels ugh

Reviews.Title: “A Tranquil Retreat”
Reviews.Author: Allison46
Reviews.Content: stayed partner hotel lovely definately recommend staying bought bookingcom half price hotel recommended price received lovely accomodation floor lift heard sound night slept soundly faced road visiting busy centre paris peaceful quiet staff extremely friendly helpful help flight delayed due snow closing uk airports couldnt home suggested book extra nights told didnt funds pay expecting extra stay didnt matter low rate booked bookingcom lot stress stay fortunately relative paid bill stay breakfast usually included price euros extra alot breakfast bought nearby local cafes 8 euros coffee orange juice croissant bread jam hotel breakfast worth provide eat price cereals juice tea coffee ham cheese breads pastries jams cooked breakfast scrambled eggs bacon sausages option eat day hotel clean modern fuss decor feels home liked sound fountain reception calming drinking cup tea looking art seating

Reviews.Title: “A perfect gem and where I will stay next time”
Reviews.Author: vixiela
Reviews.Content: husband stayed rental apt marais nightmare fashion week paris finding hotel easy finally found moved boutique hotel touch simply elegant larger feel luxury hotel staff lovely breakfast europe loved location quieter neighborhoods close river feel near river location feels central

Reviews.Title: “A top choice for Paris - clean, well located, with great staff.”
Reviews.Author: ED77
Reviews.Content: husband travelled lot europe fair share supposed 4 star hotels exception lovely hotel amazingly clean fantastic service front desk located paris arent massive expected europe opinion ours perfectly comfortable purposes comfy beds note strong hot shower sometimes elusive europe free wifi definitely bonus am typing review whilst using hasnt dropped strong consistent connection definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Lovely modern hotel in a central location”
Reviews.Author: CCKlyman
Reviews.Content: located short walk gare de lyon centrally located near des marais antoine louvre little hotel gem spotlessly clean modern tastefully decorated bath tiny functional staff extremely helpful cabs restaurant suggestions drawback hotel nearest metro stop little bit walk

Reviews.Title: “One of the better hotels in Bastille, Paris”
Reviews.Author: ANK09
Reviews.Content: staying hotel nearly week monday thursday hotel clean staff friendly offers excellent breakfast morning pretty busy 8am hotel floors hotel gym staying dont consider air conditioning basement gym 10 mins free wifi hotel available nice recently tv system issues english channels excellent hotel location price recommend people staying short time time

Reviews.Title: “Modern and charming hidden gem”
Reviews.Author: Ombeline
Reviews.Content: stayed marceau bastille hotel february couple nights ideally situated 5 minutes de la bastille means public transport bus metro nightlife variety pubs restaurants clubs de la bastille indeed wide plus obviously opera house saying hotel situated direction pretty sleep wont disturbed noisy people staggering pub hotel clean comfortable moderntrendy theme acts gallery paintings photographs displayed sale bar dining staff helpful restaurant 1am drink concierge bar 3 types urban stayed decoration softer colour patterns privilege larger wasnt massive 2night stay free wifi havent throughout flat screen tvs hairdryer safe deposit box minibar cheapest promotional worthwhile

Reviews.Title: “Comfortable 4 star hotel with a bit of character”
Reviews.Author: byrd_g
Reviews.Content: regularly stay hotel business bastille hotel choice neither bland overly quirky nice touches regular art displays reception free wifi parisien hotels charge fortune basic service else pile onto bill minor criticism breakfast buffet quality seating little cramped peak times

Reviews.Title: “Excellent boutique hotel - would highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: DiehlTX
Reviews.Content: stayed marceau based recommendation french collegue exceptional location perfect walking distance activities bastille hotel clean modern chic beds extremely comfortable hotels stayed europe staff accomodating natured stellar attempts communicate french am american true sophistication combined welcoming atmosphere hotel unique definitely stay recommend

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Stay”
Reviews.Author: paencil
Reviews.Content: returned night stay recommend hotel clean staff friendly helpfull location balcony sixth floor nice doors return

Reviews.Title: “Excellent...enough said!”
Reviews.Author: giffypletts
Reviews.Content: le marceau bastille hotel stayed excellent travelled paris week february stayed modern spotlessly clean hotel staff friendly greeted time walked past front desk trouble fittings contemporary tidy looked brand newthe cleaned daily efficiently fresh towels toiletries bathroom breakfast buffet overall thoroughly enjoyable stay

Reviews.Title: “Great place to base yourself for a weekend in Paris”
Reviews.Author: AshOxford_UK
Reviews.Content: bit shopping eat served base weekend convenient location metro line gare du nord edge marais 5 mins walk isle saint louis didnt spend time hotel eat breakfast comfortable immaculately clean front desk friendly relaxed

HotelInfo.Name: Le Marceau Bastille Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 13 Rue Jules Cesar, 75012 Paris, France
